results.title: Acute effect of simvastatin on inflammation and oxidative stress in chronic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: This study assessed the acute effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and OS markers in @<m>DISEASE_Hyper_IgM_Immunodeficiency_Syndrome_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053307 @@@stage 3 and 4@@@ @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
